topics.body: So yeah, I saw Into the Woods today. That movie was fucking awful.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54cc367f6368724c57100a00#post_54cc367f6368724c57100a00
There were seens in which is was bored or I was confused or I was PISSED OFF.
But never happy. It was poorly paced, poorly written, and just overall poor. Characterization was minimal at best nonexistent at worst. There were waaaay too many plot threads, some of which had no resolution. The conflict was completely contrived and it was just so fucking slooooooooooooooooow.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

What is it about musicals and them almost always getting shitty movie adaptations?[/bq]
The problem with most adaptations in that the directors for the most part aren't fans of the original content.
